testCases.title: Contact Listing and Display
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality of the Contacts listing, including column display and pagination.
testCases.expectedResult: The Contacts list should display all contacts with correct information in appropriate columns and provide pagination controls.

steps.stepDescription: Login to the system with valid credentials.
steps.expectedResult: User should be successfully logged in.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load with contact records displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all expected columns are present in the contact listing.
steps.expectedResult: Columns should include: Full Name, Gender, Age Group, Phone, Location, Created By, Created On, and Status.

steps.stepDescription: Verify contact records display correct information.
steps.expectedResult: Each contact record should display appropriate data in all columns.

steps.stepDescription: Test the pagination controls if multiple pages of contacts exist.
steps.expectedResult: Pagination controls should navigate between pages of contact records.

steps.stepDescription: Verify page information display if available.
steps.expectedResult: Page information should accurately reflect current page and total records.

testCases.title: Contact Search Functionality
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to search and filter contacts based on various criteria.
testCases.expectedResult: The search function should filter contacts based on entered criteria and display matching results.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on the Search button.
steps.expectedResult: Search Contact modal should open with search fields.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all search fields are present.
steps.expectedResult: Search fields should include: Name, Phone, Age, Sex, Location, ID Type, Nationality, Language, and Tribe.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Name only.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those matching the entered name.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Phone number.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those matching the entered phone number.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Age (using dropdown).
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those within the selected age range.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Sex (using dropdown).
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those matching the selected gender.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Location (using dropdown).
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those in the selected location.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by other criteria (ID Type, Nationality, Language, Tribe).
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts based on each selected criterion.

steps.stepDescription: Test combining multiple search criteria.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter contacts to show only those matching all entered criteria.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Apply button to execute the search.
steps.expectedResult: Search should execute and filtered results should display in the contact list.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Cancel button to dismiss the search.
steps.expectedResult: Search modal should close without applying filters.

testCases.title: Contact Details View
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to view detailed information for an existing contact.
testCases.expectedResult: Contact details should be displayed accurately with all relevant information.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load with contact records.

steps.stepDescription: Click on a contact record in the list.
steps.expectedResult: Contact Details modal should open showing detailed information for the selected contact.

steps.stepDescription: Verify basic contact information is displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: Fullname and Age.

steps.stepDescription: Verify demographic information is displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: Sex, Nearest Landmark, Nationality.

steps.stepDescription: Verify identification information is displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: ID Type, ID Number, Language.

steps.stepDescription: Verify refugee status information is displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: Is a Refugee field and Tribe.

steps.stepDescription: Verify contact information is displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: Phone Number, Alternative Contact, Email.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the information displayed matches the contact record.
steps.expectedResult: All displayed information should be accurate for the selected contact.

steps.stepDescription: Test closing the Contact Details modal.
steps.expectedResult: Modal should close and return to the contact list view.

testCases.title: Contact Creation
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to create new contacts in the system.
testCases.expectedResult: New contacts should be successfully created with all specified information.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Locate and click a 'New Contact' or 'Add' button if available.
steps.expectedResult: New Contact form should open.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all required fields are present in the form.
steps.expectedResult: Form should include necessary fields for contact creation (Name, Phone, etc.).

steps.stepDescription: Test creating a contact without filling required fields.
steps.expectedResult: System should prevent submission and highlight required fields.

steps.stepDescription: Fill in basic contact information (Name, Phone).
steps.expectedResult: Fields should accept input without errors.

steps.stepDescription: Set demographic information (Age, Sex, Location).
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown fields should allow selection of appropriate values.

steps.stepDescription: Fill in identification information (ID Type, ID Number).
steps.expectedResult: Fields should accept input without errors.

steps.stepDescription: Set language and nationality information.
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown fields should allow selection of appropriate values.

steps.stepDescription: Indicate refugee status if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Refugee status options should be selectable.

steps.stepDescription: Add additional contact information (Alternative Contact, Email).
steps.expectedResult: Fields should accept input without errors.

steps.stepDescription: Submit the new contact form.
steps.expectedResult: Contact should be created successfully and appear in the contacts list.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the new contact appears with correct information.
steps.expectedResult: New contact should be displayed with all entered information.

testCases.title: Contact Editing
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to edit existing contact information.
testCases.expectedResult: Contact information should be successfully updated with changes preserved in the system.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on a contact record to view details.
steps.expectedResult: Contact Details modal should open.

steps.stepDescription: Locate and click an Edit button if available.
steps.expectedResult: Contact details should become editable.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the contact's name.
steps.expectedResult: Name field should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify demographic information (Age, Sex).
steps.expectedResult: Demographic fields should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify location information.
steps.expectedResult: Location field should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify phone number.
steps.expectedResult: Phone number field should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Save the changes.
steps.expectedResult: Changes should be saved successfully and reflected in the contact list.

steps.stepDescription: Verify changes persist by reopening the contact details.
steps.expectedResult: Updated information should be displayed when viewing contact details again.

testCases.title: Contact Association with Cases
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to associate contacts with cases in the system.
testCases.expectedResult: Contacts should be successfully associated with cases and this relationship should be maintained.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Contacts section.
steps.expectedResult: Contacts listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Select a contact to use for case association.
steps.expectedResult: Contact details should be accessible.

steps.stepDescription: Locate a function to associate the contact with a case (if available).
steps.expectedResult: Case association interface should be accessible.

steps.stepDescription: Alternatively, navigate to case creation and select this contact.
steps.expectedResult: Case creation should allow selection of existing contacts.

steps.stepDescription: Create or select a case to associate with the contact.
steps.expectedResult: Case should be selectable/creatable for association.

steps.stepDescription: Confirm the association between contact and case.
steps.expectedResult: System should confirm successful association.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the association is reflected in the contact details.
steps.expectedResult: Contact details should show associated case(s) if such functionality exists.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the association is reflected in the case details.
steps.expectedResult: Case details should show associated contact(s).
